org.drip.service.api

Class CreditAnalytics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.service.api.CreditAnalytics

  • public class CreditAnalytics
extends java.lang.Object
    This class exposes all the DRIP API to clients – this class is the main functional interface.

                     DiscountCurve dc,
                     CreditCurve cc)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Computes the bond's theoretical price from discount curve and the credit curve (simplified version)
        Parameters:
        strBondId - Bond ID
        dt - Valuation Date
        dc - Discount Curve
        cc - Credit Curve
        Returns:
        Price
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if exception encountered during calculation
